meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of a symposium.
meanings.sent1: The symposiac discussion was informative and engaging.
meanings.sent2: The symposiac event brought together experts from various fields.
meanings.sent3: The symposiac atmosphere was filled with intellectual energy and curiosity.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a symposiac gathering of diverse ideas and perspectives.
meanings.sent5: The symposiac setting was like a melting pot of knowledge and insights.

meanings.sent1: As a symposiac, he contributed valuable insights to the discussion.
meanings.sent2: The symposiacs shared their research findings with the audience.
meanings.sent3: The symposiacs eagerly awaited their turn to speak at the symposium.
meanings.sent4: She stood out among the symposiacs with her innovative approach.
meanings.sent5: The symposiacs formed a diverse group of experts in the room.
